source.87a7533d:
HERE COMES OUR FIRST MACHINE LEARNING MODEL
"RANDOM FOREST MODEL": THIS MODEL COMES UNDER SUPERVISED LEARNING ALGORITHM WHERE IT IS CLASSIFIED INTO CLASSIFICATION AND REGRESSION AND HERE COMES OUR 
RANDOM FOREST ALGORITHM ITS IS BUILD USING SEVERAL TREES (naming Reason for this : each decision tree in the forest considers a random subset of features when forming questions and only has access to a random set of the training data points.)
here are two fundamental ideas behind a random forest, both of which are well known to us in our daily life:
Constructing a flowchart of questions and answers leading to a decision
The wisdom of the (random and diverse) crowd.

"WHERE THIS ALGORITHM LEARN FROM THAT PAST DATA"
